Table.Name: Per Device Billing (SW)
Table.Notes: This group is a place holder group for all Per Device Billing automation tasks.

Table.Name: Do Not Bill (SW)
Table.FullName: Simpleworks Automations.Per Device Billing (SW).Do Not Bill (SW)
Table.Notes: Shows all Workstations and Servers that have the Do Not Bill EDF checked.

Table.Name: Do Not Bill
Table.SQL: SELECT computers.computerid as `Computer Id`, computers.name as `Computer Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, computers.domain as `Computer Domain`, computers.username as `Computer User`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0') as `Computer - Extra Data Field - Default - Under MSP Contract`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0') as `Computer - Extra Data Field - Billing (SW) - Do Not Bill` FROM Computers LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId) LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned1 ON (edfAssigned1.id=Computers.ComputerId and edfAssigned1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault1 ON (edfDefault1.id=0 and edfDefault1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned2 ON (edfAssigned2.id=Computers.ComputerId and edfAssigned2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='6577aeb7-e064-4682-8e3e-9a5e96dc7306')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault2 ON (edfDefault2.id=0 and edfDefault2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='6577aeb7-e064-4682-8e3e-9a5e96dc7306')) WHERE ((((IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0')<>0) AND (IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0')<>0))))
Table.SearchXML: <LabTechAbstractSearch><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>Computer.Extra Data Field.Default.Under MSP Contract</lon><lok>Computer.Edf.45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e</lok><lmo>IsTrue</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>Computer.Extra Data Field.Billing (SW).Do Not Bill</lon><lok>Computer.Edf.6577aeb7-e064-4682-8e3e-9a5e96dc7306</lok><lmo>IsTrue</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn></cn></asn></cn></asn></LabTechAbstractSearch>

Table.Name: Systems Last Contact > 6 Months (SW)
Table.FullName: Simpleworks Automations.Per Device Billing (SW).Systems Last Contact > 6 Months (SW)
Table.Notes: This group shows all workstations and servers that have not checked in over 6 months.

Table.Name: Systems Last Contact > 6 Months (SW)
Table.SQL: SELECT computers.computerid as `Computer Id`, computers.name as `Computer Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, computers.domain as `Computer Domain`, computers.username as `Computer User`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0') as `Computer - Extra Data Field - Billing (SW) - Last Contact < 6 Months`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0') as `Computer - Extra Data Field - Default - Under MSP Contract` FROM Computers LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId) LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned1 ON (edfAssigned1.id=Computers.ComputerId and edfAssigned1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='e519d163-546c-483c-8ae3-1f65ec73a42e')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault1 ON (edfDefault1.id=0 and edfDefault1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='e519d163-546c-483c-8ae3-1f65ec73a42e')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned2 ON (edfAssigned2.id=Computers.ComputerId and edfAssigned2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault2 ON (edfDefault2.id=0 and edfDefault2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e')) WHERE ((((IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0')=0) AND (IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0')<>0))))
Table.SearchXML: <LabTechAbstractSearch><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>Computer.Extra Data Field.Billing (SW).Last Contact < 6 Months</lon><lok>Computer.Edf.e519d163-546c-483c-8ae3-1f65ec73a42e</lok><lmo>IsFalse</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>Computer.Extra Data Field.Default.Under MSP Contract</lon><lok>Computer.Edf.45c2da7e-3bf5-11e1-92fd-c1ee63289e9e</lok><lmo>IsTrue</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn></cn></asn></cn></asn></LabTechAbstractSearch>

Table.Name: Per Device Billing Eligibility (SW)
Table.FullName: Simpleworks Automations.Per Device Billing (SW).Per Device Billing Eligibility (SW)
Table.Notes: This group assists with automating the bill for managed workstations and servers based on their type. Its main puporse is to categorize the systems based on the searches and also run the "Eligibility" scripts to check billing EDFs.

Table.Name: All Computers
Table.SQL: SELECT computers.computerid as `Computer Id`, computers.name as `Computer Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, computers.domain as `Computer Domain`, computers.username as `Computer User`, Computers.Name as `Computer.General.Name` FROM Computers LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId) LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) WHERE ((Computers.Name <> ' '))

Table.Name: vSphere Hosts
Table.SQL: SELECT networkdevices.deviceid as `Network Device Id`, networkdevices.name as `Device Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, LookupDeviceCode.DeviceType as `NetworkDevice.General.Type` FROM NetworkDevices LEFT JOIN Locations ON (NetworkDevices.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Clients.ClientId=Locations.ClientId) LEFT JOIN LookupDeviceCode ON (LookupDeviceCode.DeviceCode = NetworkDevices.DeviceType) WHERE ((LookupDeviceCode.DeviceType = 'vSphere Host'))
